promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic rabbit normal-type pokemon holding a diamond sword. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bladibun, a a young basic rabbit normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Moonblast. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "normal" or "Bladibun". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, rabbit-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, faded prismatic bokeh background
generatedDescription: This dainty moonlit generalist species, often seen in sprawling meadows, harnesses lunar power for its Moonblast ability. It leads a tranquil, grazing life.
